message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $16,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product, but I believe I can find it elsewhere for a lower price. My offer for the product is $10,000.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but my price reflects the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $14,500. This is my best offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $12,500 for the product.
